mapper.select: select a.qna_idx, a.qna_title, a.qna_content, a.qna_regDate, a.qna_modiDate, a.qna_ip, (select mb_nick from camp_member where mb_idx = a.mb_idx) as mb_nick from camp_qna a order by qna_idx desc limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}
select a.qna_title,a.qna_ref, a.qna_content, a.qna_modiDate, a.qna_ip, (select mb_nick from camp_member where mb_idx = a.mb_idx) as mb_nick from camp_qna a where qna_idx=#{qna_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into camp_qna (mb_idx, qna_title, qna_content, qna_regDate, qna_modiDate, qna_ip) values (#{mb_idx}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, now(), now(), #{qna_ip})
insert into camp_qna (qna_ref, mb_idx, qna_title, qna_content, qna_regDate, qna_modiDate, qna_ip) values (#{qna_ref},#{mb_idx}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, now(), now(), #{qna_ip})
mapper.update: update camp_qna set qna_title = #{qna_title}, qna_content = #{qna_content}, qna_modiDate = #{rv_modiDate}, qna_ip = ${qna_ip} where qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
update camp_qna set qna_read = qna_read +1 where qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
